title: 820-3462 not detecting battery.
message: so i got this machine, and it wasnt turning on. customer tried to dissasembly it, broke trackpad flex and fan. ive ordered those two, as a result the machine is slow for now, it has sensors issues. I  replaced the U7000, the typical ISL in these. turned on. alright i reassemble but now the machine wont detect battery. the two  things were the battery screws go were broken so i resoldered them. but the battery isnt detected im thinking ?ts a screwed battery, but i want to make sure before making my customer buy new one. ive checked both data lines, and that the two battery screws are properly attached, so it isnt the special screw. i get 1-2v at pin 5 of Q7055. but the on the data lines on battery only i get 0V, but when i put charger in, i get proper volts at the data lines. so its just a screwed battery, or it may be related to the SMC, or U7000?

title: 820-3462 not detecting battery.
message:
Did you tight enough the special activation screw?
Check if A1/10 and J1/7 pins from battery connector have good contact to ground.
Post exact value for diode mode on SCL/SDA lines.

title: 820-3462 not detecting battery.
message: Also post voltage for PPBUS_G3H with just the charger no battery plugged in

title: 820-3462 not detecting battery.
message: 2informaticos SCL is open to ground....and SDA is 1080 in diode mode. as for what JohnB8812 asked, PPBUS_G3H is 12.56v!

title: 820-3462 not detecting battery.
message: well i guess im missing something, if i use red probe on ground and take the measurements with the black one i get .510 on both lines...

title: 820-3462 not detecting battery.
message: You have bad batteries simple. This machine has shit batteries so good luck finding a good one...

title: 820-3462 not detecting battery.
message: JohnB8812 any idea where i can get a decent one?; else this customer will have to do with shit from ebay regrettably :(

title: 820-3462 not detecting battery.
message: eBay is probably even better than China lol, so it's truly random if you get a good one

title: 820-3462 not detecting battery.
message:
"Check if A1/10 and J1/7 pins from battery connector have good contact to ground."
Did you check that?

title: 820-3462 not detecting battery.
message: 2informaticos SYS_DET_3_4 is properly grounded when i put the screw. i made sure of this by testing two times. or do you mean something else?

title: 820-3462 not detecting battery.
message: Then good luck to find a good battery...

title: 820-3462 not detecting battery.
message: Well, ive ordered one from ebay. ill updated the post once i get it!
